Which of the following statements regarding the schilling test for vitamin B12 malabsorption is most accurate?

options.label: A
options.text: The schilling test results are abnormal in patients with dietary vitamin B12 deficiency

options.label: B
options.text: In patients with pernicious anemia, the results of the schilling test normalize after oral administration of intrinsic factor

options.label: C
options.text: In patients with ileal disease the results of the schilling test normalize after oral administration of intrinsic factor.

options.text: Pancreatic exocrine insufficiency does not cause schilling test results to be abnormal

questions.correct_answer: B. In patients with pernicious anemia, the results of the schilling test normalize after oral administration of intrinsic factor
